item.description:
Repost from abbynormal0ne https://twitter.com/abbynormal0ne/statuses/379463477489709056/:

A woman of Indian descent won #MissAmerica, & Twitter is going full-on racist. Way to be classy, America. http://bit.ly/1egSEAN
